item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Hosein Montazer — a DevOps engineer with over 7 years of hands-on experience building automation pipelines, scaling infrastructure, and making systems more reliable and observable.

I’m passionate about designing efficient CI/CD workflows, writing clean and reusable Ansible roles, optimizing Docker-based deployments, and pushing for operational excellence through monitoring stacks like Prometheus, ELK, and Grafana.

Currently, I’m diving deeper into Kubernetes, GitOps (ArgoCD), and Go development. I enjoy working with teams that value fast iteration, clean architecture, and clear communication — preferably remote and globally distributed.
